trailingComments.value:
*
 * A depth shader material.
 *
 * @class DepthMaterial
 * @submodule materials
 * @extends ShaderMaterial
 * @constructor
 * @param {PerspectiveCamera} [camera] - A camera.

*
	 * Adopts the settings of the given camera.
	 *
	 * @method adoptCameraSettings
	 * @param {PerspectiveCamera} camera - A camera.
